Sentiment Lexicon

A sentiment lexicon with eitheir polarity or score.

proust_sentiments(type = "polarity")

Arguments

type

polarity (positive or negative) or score on six sentiments (joy, fear, sadness, anger, surprise, disgust)

Source

Amine Abdaoui, Jérôme Azé, Sandra Bringay et Pascal Poncelet. FEEL: French Expanded Emotion Lexicon. Language Resources and Evaluation, LRE 2016, pp 1-23.

Value

a tibble

Examples

proust_sentiments(type = "score")
#> # A tibble: 11,530 x 2
#>           word sentiment
#>  *       <chr>     <chr>
#>  1 abaissement   sadness
#>  2    abaisser   sadness
#>  3     abandon      fear
#>  4     abandon   sadness
#>  5     abandon     anger
#>  6     abandon  surprise
#>  7  abandonner      fear
#>  8  abandonner   sadness
#>  9  abandonner     anger
#> 10  abandonner   disgust
#> # ... with 11,520 more rows
